ch0141_00_apollo/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I didn’t expect to
see you here.
ch0141_00_apollo/0101_0701_02_10: I must make sure you don’t get in our way.
ch0141_00_apollo/7101_0701_01_10:
My dream is for Giovanni to stand atop the
world—and for Team Rocket to control everything!
ch0141_00_apollo/7101_0701_02_10:
If you ever block me from fulfilling my dreams,
I will not restrain myself.
ch0141_00_apollo/7101_0701_03_10:
I won’t go easy on you, even if you scream
or cry.
ch0141_00_apollo/7102_0701_01_10: If it’s for Giovanni’s sake, I’ll do whatever it takes.
ch0141_00_apollo/7102_0701_02_10:
I’m not the only one who thinks like this—every
member of Team Rocket shares this sentiment.
ch0141_00_apollo/7102_0701_03_10:
Team Rocket is willing to take any risk. When you
face us, I wonder how far your battling skills
will take you.
ch0141_00_apollo/7103_0701_01_10:
There’s a thin line between justice and evil.
Whoever wins defines justice.
ch0141_00_apollo/7103_0701_02_10: So you’d better watch out, and don’t lose to us.
ch0141_00_apollo/7104_0701_01_10: Hopefully, among the Trainers here on Pasio…
ch0141_00_apollo/7104_0701_02_10:
we can find new, skilled talent that will swear
loyalty to Giovanni and his ideals willingly.
ch0141_00_apollo/7105_0701_01_10: There is a clear hierarchy in Team Rocket.
ch0141_00_apollo/7105_0701_02_10:
You seem to be good at teaming up with people,
but I wonder if you’re good at working in
an organization.
ch0141_00_apollo/7105_0701_03_10:
Sometimes you need to make ruthless decisions at
the expense of your peers. You can’t be naïve.
ch0141_00_apollo/1701_0701_01_10: Take this. No reason, really. I just felt like it.
ch0141_00_apollo/1701_0702_01_10: I look forward to seeing how you use it.
ch0141_00_apollo/2501_0701_01_10: When Giovanni was away, I led Team Rocket.
ch0141_00_apollo/2501_0701_02_10:
But he returned and is once again Team Rocket’s
boss. Our organization has been reborn—stronger
than ever!
ch0141_00_apollo/2501_0701_03_10:
Once again, I’m witnessing the significance of
his presence.
ch0141_00_apollo/2501_0702_01_10:
An organization can change dramatically
depending on who leads it.
ch0141_00_apollo/2501_0702_02_10: I cannot imagine Team Rocket without Giovanni.
ch0141_00_apollo/2511_0701_01_10: Why don’t you come and work for Team Rocket?
ch0141_00_apollo/2511_0701_03_10:
You look surprised. I do acknowledge your
skills—but nothing else!
ch0141_00_apollo/2511_0702_01_10:
I bet you have things you won’t budge on, just
like us.
ch0141_00_apollo/2511_0702_02_10:
But if you ever change your mind, I won’t
turn you away.
ch0141_00_apollo/3001_0701_01_10:
I had a splendid dream last night. If only I could
make it become my reality...
ch0141_00_apollo/3003_0701_01_10:
As long as you have a dream, you can continue
moving forward, no matter how hard things get.
ch0141_00_apollo/3005_0701_01_10:
One day, I will restore Team Rocket to its former
shining glory—just like the stars in the night sky.
